Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the final average salary calculation for Triborough bridge and tunnel members
Summary: Provides for an alternate final average salary calculation for Triborough bridge and tunnel members where such calculation includes certain dates.
LawCode: Amd ยง608, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the final average salary calculation for Triborough bridge and tunnel members
